subject: Preakness Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
organizations: Harris Farms Horse Division of Harris Rach Beef Co
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the overwhelming favorite for the Preakness, was brought up by modest owners in a region long considered inferior to the lush fields of Kentucky.
